definition: A term commonly used to describe a specific type of close relationship between two individuals who share the same birth date and are born within a short span of time. This term is often used to refer to siblings who are born as twins or to individuals who are born on the same day but in different years.

examples.german: Meine Zwillingsschwester und ich sehen uns sehr ähnlich.
examples.english: My twin sister and I look very similar.

examples.german: Er hat einen Zwilling, der genauso aussieht wie er.
examples.english: He has a twin who looks just like him.

examples.german: Mein Bruder und ich sind Zwillinge, aber wir sind nicht eineiig.
examples.english: My brother and I are twins, but we are not identical.
